titleInfo.title: "Passive victim - strong survivor?" Perceived meaning of labels applied to women who were raped

mods.abstract: We provide labeled datasets from the three studies reported in Papendick, M., & Bohner, G. (2017). "Passive victim -- strong survivor"? Perceived meaning of labels applied to women who were raped. *PLOS ONE*, *12(5)*, e0177550. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0177550
